meanings.definition: Of or relating to a vestment.
meanings.sent1: The priest wore a vestmental robe during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The church displayed beautiful vestmental garments.
meanings.sent3: The vestmental attire made the priest look very dignified.
meanings.sent4: Her vestmental outfit shone brightly under the church lights.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the vestmental fabric were mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The vestmental stole added a touch of elegance to the priest's attire.
meanings.sent2: The vestmental chasuble was carefully embroidered with gold thread.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to play with the vestmental sash, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The vestmental cloak wrapped around her like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the vestmental garments rustling filled the quiet church.
